entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
